mapper.select: SELECT O.*, M.*, O.gmt_create AS createTime FROM carpool_order O LEFT JOIN carpool_match M ON O.match_id = M.match_id WHERE O.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND O.city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY O.apply_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE carpool_order SET status = 1,match_status = 1 WHERE order_no = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
